titles: A letter sent from a gentleman of Beverley, to one Mr. Holby gent' of London, concerning the entertainment of my lord of Holland by the king, at His Majesties court at Beverley, the fifteenth day of this present July, 1642.
publisher: Printed for Tho: Banks and William Lee.,
notes: Dated at end of text: Beverley, 18 Julii, 1642.
Reproduction of original in: Eton College. Library.
